meanings.definition: The quality or state of being visible.
meanings.sent1: The visiblenesses of the stars in the night sky amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The visiblenesses of the colorful flowers in the garden brought joy to all who passed by.
meanings.sent3: The visiblenesses of the mischievous cat hiding behind the curtain made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The visiblenesses of the truth were like bright beacons in the darkness of lies.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is able to be seen or perceived.
meanings.sent1: The visiblenesses of the road signs helped the lost travelers find their way.
meanings.sent2: The visiblenesses of the distant ship on the horizon slowly disappeared into the fog.
meanings.sent3: The visiblenesses of the cookies on the counter tempted the hungry dog to sneak a bite.

meanings.sent5: The visiblenesses of the city lights from the hilltop view were mesmerizing.
